title: Did Trey Goody say he was a mother from hell in Belusi's notes to Coved Reilve?
subtitle: The former Republican Congressman responded angryly to the remarks made by the President of the Democratic House of Representatives in December 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In December 2020, Fox News's shareholder Trey Goody said that it was "God over Hell" in Nancy Pelosi's remarks on relief funding COVID-19.
